metadata.title: CVE-2019-17056 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: llcp_sock_create in net/nfc/llcp_sock.c in the AF_NFC network module in theLinux kernel through 5.3.2 does not enforce CAP_NET_RAW, which means thatunprivileged users can create a raw socket, aka CID-3a359798b176.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
